DOC.brief_title: A Study On Concentrations Of 16448 In Blood And The Safety Of This Compound In Healthy Males With Premature Ejaculation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Body weight > 50kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 1930 Healthy men long term ( least 6 month ) symptoms PE Erectile Dysfunction ( patient EF ( Erectile Function ) domain IIEF ( International Index Erectile Function questionnaire > 26 normal ) No history reduce sexual desire No history significant psychiatric illness currently active significant medical illness No SSRI 's ( Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ) use within last 4 month No history diabetes , renal hepatic disease No significant injury head spinal cord i.e . history head injury , spinal cord injury , condition multiple sclerosis . Exclusion criterion : Previous current use PDE5 ( Phosphodiesterase type 5 ) inhibitor treatment Erectile Dysfunction Subject receive treatment last 6 month depression , psychiatric disorder , mood disorder , schizophrenia , substance abuse anxiety disorder Subject take tricyclic antidepressant , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( related drug ) , monoamine oxidase inhibitor ÃŸblockers Subject receive continue receive treatment PE ( e.g . local anaesthetic spray , intracavernosal injection ) four week prior study start Subject history clinically significant organic disease e.g . uncontrolled hypertension , ischemic heart
